listitem.simpara: Various small changes to the frontend to improve the layout (36772).
References to UCC 2.0 have been updated (38801).
Hook directories have been added which make it possible to place arbitrary scripts in a UCC image which will be executed by the initramfs (31384).
It is now possible to assign a default UCS image server for a UCC client. The UCC client will then download its image from the designated server (35410).
The ucc-image-add-citrix-receiver script now cleans out the local repository of retrieved package files (38741).
The ucc-image-add-citrix-receiver script now installs packages more reliably by using the dpkg parameters --force-confnew --force-overwrite --force-overwrite-dir (38905).
The image generation program ucc-image has been adapted to support creating large iso files on UCS 4 (38906).
The UCC hardware settings policy tooltip has been adapted to use the correct xrandr parameter for querying the display devices (38678).
The layout of the UCC installation wizard has been changed since a Citrix receiver is now integrated into UCC thin client images. A custom receiver can optionally be uploaded (38806).
The UCC image module has been updated to show available UCC 2.1 images (38912).
Desktop and thin-client image use a newer kernel (3.16) and xserver-core (1.16) version from Ubuntu Utopic (37970).
Citrix Receiver and the Citrix Session are now shipped with the UCC thin client image (38181).
The directory / is now mounted with option 755 when using overlayfs (38925).
Dependencies to software packages to enable "Windows Media HDX playback" have been added to the package univention-ucc-session-xenapp (38741).
The package univention-ucc-usb-raw-printer has been added to create/remove local (raw) printer queues for USB printers in order to enable "Client Printer Redirection" (37889).

A UCR config template has been added for the HDX USB redirect daemon rules file /opt/Citrix/ICAClient/usb.conf. USB redirect rules can be configured with the UCR variable ucc/xenapp/ctxusb/rules (38925).

The package univention-ucc-session-xenapp has been updated to set the UCR variable ucc/firefox/defaults/rememberSignons to 'user_pref("signon.rememberSignons",false);' by default. This prevents a recurring popup in firefox when accessing Citrix terminal services (38932).
